description: Erection of single storey front extension, hip to gable and rear dormer roof extensions with installation of 2no side rooflights and 3no front rooflights to facilitate loft conversion.
decision_conditions: The proposed development by reason of its poor design would be an excessive addition which would be overwhelming in scale, contrary to the character of the original property and would represent an incongruous roof addition which would be out of character with the existing street scene. The proposal would therefore be contrary to Policies CS8 and DM10 of the Royal Borough of Kingston upon Thames LDF Core Strategy (Adopted April 2012), and the Residential Design SPD (Adopted July 2013).

The applicant is informed that the submitted details are agreed and that Condition 4 (Fire Safety Strategy) of planning permission 22/01964/FUL is hereby discharged subject to carrying out the development in accordance with the details hereby approved.
Please add key dimensions to the Existing Elevations to indicate the areas of demolition.
